Don?t miss out, inspect today!

Description:
Beautifully renovated on 623m2 of land
Perfectly located within walking distance to Corio Village and Northern Bay Secondary College this lovely 3 bedroom family home has been superbly renovated and has a real sense of warmth through the use of contemporary neutral tones and finishes throughout. With brand new quality timber laminate flooring, new carpets and freshly painted throughout, a brand new contemporary kitchen and appliances plus a fully renovated bathroom, this home is a terrific option for a first home buyer or investor. There is simply nothing to do but move in and enjoy this lovely home.
Attention to detail has been the focus of this renovation, with a lovely choice of neutral cabinetry coupled with quality European appliances and modern industrial tapware in the newly installed kitchen. The colour choice is a perfect combination with the oak coloured timber laminated floors. The entire kitchen and accompanying dining and living space are beautifully illuminated with natural light where a sense of space has been created. There is also a dedicated study nook which the provides yet another functional space. With direct access to the backyard from the dining area there the option of entertaining guests can extend outdoors.
The fully renovated bathroom is also a stand out feature of the home, with stunning new tiling and cabinetry and includes a good sized bath. The laundry has also been fully decked out with new contemporary cabinetry and tiling.
The bedrooms are all of good size and all have new carpets and new built in robes. The master, the largest bedroom is particularly spacious has a full wall of double robes.
Fully fenced, with side driveway access to the garage and workshop at the rear of the property and a great sized flat backyard this home is certain to appeal to the young family. The gardens are low maintenance and have been recently had new edging and freshly mulched. This is a perfect home for anyone starting out or a perfect investment. Inspection is a must.
Other features:
Quality Daikin Split system heating /cooling
Gas Heater
Outside security lights
Outdoor blinds
Vulcan hot water service
Insights: 38 Carmarthen Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Low Maintenance Option, Move In or Invest
Designed for practical family living, this single level brick residence is set on a good size parcel of approximately 644sqm. The property presents excellent value & would suit a range of purchasers appealing to those wanting a low maintenance option, first home buyers or for the investor looking for an affordable property to add to their portfolio. It is set in an excellent location close to the Ring Road, schools, shopping centres and public transport.
-Corner block, well presented
-Lounge with split system A/C and rinnai gas heater
-Good size gas kitchen & casual dining area,
overlooking rear yard
-Three bedrooms fitted with built-in-robes,
-Large windows throughout give an abundance of natural light
-Carpets and ceiling fans to bedrooms,
-Entertainment area including built in BBQ and pizza oven, garden shed
-Double carport plus extra parking area perfect for caravan/trailer

Description:
Exceptional Opportunity!
Well located in the heart of Corio lies this neat 3 bedroom home on an approx. 560m2 allotment providing an excellent opportunity for those looking to get a foothold in the property market. The home comprises of a spacious lounge room with floorboards, split system air-conditioner & gas heater that flows through to the dining area and recently updated kitchen complete with dishwasher & stainless steel stove. The three generous bedrooms are serviced by the renovated bathroom that provides 2-way access to the WC adjacent the laundry at the rear of the home. With a wide side drive-way and extensive rear yard the property offers the possibility for future sub-division (STCA) presenting a fantastic opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value. With all major amenities within easy reach such as the Corio Shopping Centre, Medical facilities, schools for all ages and public transport positioning could not be better!

Description:
Great Value Family Home or Investment
Positioned in a family friendly, low traffic established street, this property is within a short distance to schools, the ring road and Corio Village and is a great 1st home or set & forget investment.
Recently refurbished, the home
comprises 4 bedrooms, all with built in robes, plus study, master with ensuite, living, dining, modern kitchen, separate laundry & more. The Kitchen is open plan to the dining area and boasts modern appliances including dishwasher and gas cook top, plenty of cupboard space and a breakfast bar. Opening out from the dining area through sliding doors is a huge decked outdoor entertaining space that is undercover & partially enclosed, whilst a large rear yard, double tandem carport & additional shed / workshop / single garage completes the attributes of the home.
This is a great value low maintenance home and is a must to inspect. Call Dion for more details.
Insights: 25 Cabernet Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish, Low Maintenance Living
Smart and sophisticated best describe this 2 year old, 3BR townhouse. Nestled in a convenient location for Melbourne commuters, this sleek home will certainly impress those looking for a low maintenance lifestyle and a fresh new home with contemporary appeal and an uncluttered, open layout design. All bedrooms boast BIR while the master has a large WIR and leads to the ensuite. Entertaining at this home is made simple with a kitchen that shines with style and practicality. Featuring a large island bench, double sink, dishwasher and stainless steel appliances, the kitchen adjoins the meals/living and opens to the undercover entertaining area, forming the social hub of the home, where indoor entertaining can seamlessly move outdoors. The secure home with double garage is fitted with an alarm system and has both ducted heating and rev/cycle heating and cooling for all-year round comfort. Complete with double glazing to all windows and a rain water tank, this townhouse is ready for you to move in today. Investors will enjoy a rental income of up to $325 p/w and the enjoyment of high depreciation potential.
Insights: 263 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 1988 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Little Fish Are Sweet
This positively geared bargain basement new townhouse is the perfect addition to your investment portfolio. It is currently rented for $280 per week on a secure 12 month lease and represents a gain of about $60 per week if you take an interest only loan at 5%! If you can find a better low risk investment anywhere else I’d suggest you snap it up, because at this price and return this one surely won’t last.
It has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, small secure yard and single carport, central heating, split system, stainless appliances and is a great compact, low maintenance townhouse. Oh and if you are looking for and extra sweetener you can claim all the depreciation allowances as it is under 2 months old! Even your accountant won’t believe how good the numbers stack up. Call now to inspect.

Description:
?Rare Opportunity for First Home or Investor?
Situated on 648m2 (approx.) is this welcoming brick home. Close to schools, shopping centres, medical centres, sporting facilities, public transport, and the Geelong Ring Road making this home perfect for commuters.
If you are a car enthusiast then this home is for you, offering a brand new built double garage out back with plenty of space to work on your car as well as leaving space to make your own man cave.
With a possible rental return of $300 - $310 P/W this would be a great addition to you investment portfolio.
• 3 great sized bedrooms, all with built in robes.
• Large lounge & separate dining area
• Exposed beams in kitchen w/ ample bench & cupboard storage
• Dish Washer
• Gas wall heating & R/C A/C in lounge
• Roller shutters on all windows
• Roller door through to large double garage
• Covered alfresco entertainment area
Potential rental return between $300-$310 p/w (approx.).
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Insights: 9 Marilyn Close, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Live In Or Rent Out
Sited on a corner block of approximately 601m2 is this solid family home. Consisting of 3 bedrooms, open kitchen/dining area and a separate lounge with polished timber floors. The house can be owner occupied or sit back and reap the proceeds with a potential rent of $260 per week. Neat and tidy, an inspection is a must.

Description:
Cloverdale Classic with Much More
In the heart of Cloverdale, Corio's best location this sensational home offers so much more than you will expect to find from the humble façade. Once inside, you will be immediately impressed with the immaculate presentation and updates throughout. Light filled, the home features a large lounge and a spacious living that includes sitting, meals and a practical renovated kitchen with new appliances, opening to the covered outdoor entertainment area. The bright and practical bathroom has been updated and there is a formal dining that could be converted to a study or used for something else. Complete with RC AC, ceiling fans, alarm and a large single garage plus a second double garage in the secure backyard. Handy to Corio Shopping Centre plus other shops, schools and transport and with easy access to the Ring Road, make this your next inspection.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 30 Corangamite Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Size Investment
Set on a massive 842m2 allotment in a quiet court location is this fantastic family home with a very accommodating floor plan. Also lending itself as the ideal investment with an excellent rental return of $270 per week. Featuring 4 bedrooms all with BIR's, the master with its own Ensuite. Enjoy two separate living areas surrounding the large central dining and light filled kitchen. Outside boasts a large backyard for the kids and easy entertaining. If you are in need of space to store a boat, trailer or caravan then this property is certain to meet those needs with double gates providing clear access through to a big double shed and further off-street parking. Includes ducted heating and split system A/C. The home is solid and allows you to simply move straight in or leased out but would respond well to a cosmetic freshen up. Located within close proximity to Corio Shopping Village plus quick access to the Melbourne road and train station. Representing great value, this is a must see!
Insights: 4 Kullaroo Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2016 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
